/>
VI.ii.4.C.2.e
.
POC  for SBP Entitlement Problems
RO personnel should contact their local finance activity’s SBP Issues POC if they encounter unresolvable SBP entitlement issues.
Reference
:  For a list of SBP Issues POCs by RO, see the
VBA Field Station Points of Contact
webpage.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section C - Coordinating Military Retired Pay (MRP) Cases With Retired Pay Centers (RPCs) and Service Departments
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section C
